aka: If I Die, It'll Be of Joy
this_title: Si je meurs, ce sera de joie
trans_title: If I Die, It'll Be of Joy
introduction: Micheline 81 years old dreams of orgasms and tells anyone who will listen that she is burning with desire. Francis 70 a seasoned activist relentlessly challenges taboos surrounding old age. Yves 68 years old feeling like a shell on a stormy sea desperately seeks love. In a world that underestimates the power of the elderly they are part of a group of activists who defy prejudices dare to reinvent sexuality love and rethink old age.
foreign_title: Si je meurs, ce sera de joie
